subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=qiǎo
|c=haau2,kiu2
|c_note=haau2 - literary; kiu2 - vernacular variant (“skillful; opportune”, also written as {{zh-l|*竅}})
|h=pfs=kháu/khiáu
|mn=khá/khiáu/kháu
|mn_note=khá - vernacular (“rare but exquisite; fake; cunning”); khiáu - vernacular (“ingenious; cunning; skillful; pretty”); kháu - literary
|mn-t=
|w=2qiau
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=Zh-qiao.ogg
|cat=n,a,adv,pn
}}
